Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Devon/Broadway
ShortDescription: #36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Ashland, Foster, Broadway due to fire department activity near Devon/Broadway.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Ashland, Foster, Broadway then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near Devon/Broadway.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute at Devon/Broadway
ShortDescription: #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via  Clark, Ashland, Foster, Sheridan, due to fire department activity near Devon/Broadway

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via  Clark, Ashland, Foster, Sheridan, then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near Devon/Broadway

Allow extra travel time.
